results.name: Row sums of triangle A133091.
comment: Even squares interleaved with hexagonal numbers, A000384; such that A000384(n), (n,odd) = A000384((n+1)/2).
link: Bruno Berselli, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,3,0,-3,0,1).
example: a(4) = 16 = sum of row 4 terms of triangle A133091: (2 + 4 + 6 + 4).
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Sep 09 2007
ext: Corrected and extended by _Philippe Deléham_, Mar 02 2012
